predicate.note: Frames file for 'dismay' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to depress, get down, or upset

example.name: passive
example.text: It also could put the government into the RU-486 business , which [*T*-487] would please feminists dismayed [*] at what they view [*T*-488] as pusillanimity in the private-sector drug industry .
example.arg: what they view [*T*-488] as pusillanimity in the private-sector drug industry
